mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subject_home(sub_time, sub_summary, sub_no) VALUES(#{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3})

mapper.update: UPDATE curriculm SET curri_oriName = #{param1}, curri_newName = #{param2} WHERE sub_no = #{param3}
